description: Model that find linear relationship between input variables and output variable
disadvantage: Would not apply well to non linear relationship

description: The process of running two or more related but different analytical models and then synthesizing the results into a single score or spread
advantage: Improve the accuracy of predictive analytics beyond what a single model can be

description: An ensemble classifier that consists of many decision trees and outputs the class that is the mode of the classes output by individual trees
advantage: Accurate, efficient with large datasets, handles missing data well
disadvantage: Observed to overfit for some datasets with noisy classification. Hard to interpret the model.

description: Incrementally building an ensemble by training each new model instance to emphasize the training instances that previous models mis-classified
disadvantage: Not reliable on noisy dataset (real world dataset). may overfit training data. Hard to interpret the model.
